Content for FO-07 info page:
- ID: FO-07
- Name: Full Onboarding (Card Selection)
- Tagline: Rate affirmations with Like/Don\'t Like instead of swiping
- Core Concept: 'Choose your affirmations deliberately, not reactively'
- Description: Explain the 20-card Like/Don\'t Like review system

Key differences section comparing FO-07 to FO-04:
| Aspect | FO-04 | FO-07 |
| Affirmation selection | Swipe cards (keep/discard) | Like/Don\'t Like buttons |
| Batch size | 10 at a time, 3 batches | 20 at once |
| Feedback loop | Iterative (learns from swipes) | Single review |
| Progress bar | Yes | No |
| Transitions | Confetti | Pulsing heart |

acceptance_criteria: npm run dev succeeds and /fo-07/info renders without errors
closed_reason: Created FO-07 info page at app/fo-07/info/page.tsx following FO-04 pattern. Included all required content: tagline, core concept, how it works flow, comparison table with FO-04, key features, card selection interface details, and technical details.
